thread.title: Backlash grows over coastal growth as Gulf Shores presses forward with hotel project
thread.title_full: Backlash grows over coastal growth as Gulf Shores presses forward with hotel project

author: John Sharp | jsharp@al.com
title: Backlash grows over coastal growth as Gulf Shores presses forward with hotel project
text: Social media criticism mounted after the city, on Jan. 6, posted the announcement of a new 240-room hotel and conference center near its public beach. The city claims the development will help improve surrounding infrastructure as growth and tourism continues to explode in Baldwin County.
